tasks.name: Research Company Sustainability Reports
tasks.description: Retrieve official 2024 ESG reports for Coca-Cola and PepsiCo. Focus on environmental metrics (carbon, water, waste), social metrics (labor, diversity), and governance.
tasks.use_case: Gather primary source data for comparison.
success_criteria: Official 2024 reports located and key metrics extracted.

tasks.name: Gather Third-Party ESG Ratings
tasks.description: Collect ESG ratings from MSCI, Sustainalytics, and S&P Global for both companies. Identify industry leaders for benchmarking.
tasks.use_case: Provide objective third-party verification and context.
success_criteria: Ratings from at least 2 major agencies retrieved.

tasks.name: Verify Data from SEC & CDP
tasks.description: Cross-reference key claims with SEC filings and CDP disclosures to ensure accuracy.
tasks.use_case: Validate self-reported data against regulatory filings.
success_criteria: Key data points verified against regulatory submissions.

tasks.name: Analyze Environmental Performance
tasks.description: Deep dive analysis of environmental pillars: Carbon emissions, water usage, waste management, with a specific focus on plastic and sustainability initiatives.

tasks.name: Analyze Social & Governance Performance
tasks.description: Analyze social (labor, diversity, community) and governance (ethics, board) performance.
tasks.use_case: Detailed comparison of S and G pillars.
success_criteria: Comparative analysis of S and G pillars generated.

tasks.name: Create Comprehensive Report
tasks.description: Generate a 5-10 page professional HTML report comparing Coca-Cola vs PepsiCo ESG performance. Include executive summary, data tables, and visualizations. Benchmark against industry leaders.

tasks.name: Email Report
tasks.description: Email the final report as an attachment to kevin.dragan@outlook.com. Include a brief executive summary in the email body.
